summary.span: 命名空间是用于 Entity Framework 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序。

span.span: The namespace is the .NET Framework Data Provider for the Entity Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `EntityClient` 提供程序使用特定于存储的 [!INCLUDE[vstecado](~/includes/vstecado-md.md)] 数据提供程序类和映射元数据以与实体数据模型进行交互。The `EntityClient` provider uses storage-specific [!INCLUDE[vstecado](~/includes/vstecado-md.md)] Data Provider classes and mapping metadata for interacting with entity data models. `EntityClient` 将在概念实体上执行的操作转换为对物理数据源执行的操作。`EntityClient` translates operations performed on conceptual entities into operations performed on physical data sources. 然后再将物理数据源返回的结果集转换为概念性实体。It translates result sets returned from physical data sources into conceptual entities. > [!NOTE] > 有关如何在 [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)] 应用程序中使用此命名空间的详细信息，请参阅[ADO.NET 实体框架](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/index.md)。For more information about how to use this namespace in [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)] applications, see [ADO.NET Entity Framework](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/index.md).

related.span: 用于实体框架的 EntityClient 提供程序
